snippet: Over the past decade, Baruch has established itself as host to the basketball stars, lending its court to more than 60 N.B.A. and N.C.A.A. Division I teams passing through New York City.
abstract: Many NBA and NCAA basketball teams practice at Baruch College gym in Manhattan when visiting New York area, raising school's national profile; students have opportunity to see prominent athletes play and money raised helps to improve and expand athletic department.
lead_paragraph: Over the past decade, Baruch has established itself as host to the basketball stars, lending its court to more than 60 N.B.A. and N.C.A.A. Division I teams passing through New York City.

headline.main: At Baruch, a New York Rental to the Stars, the Wood Floors Tend to Squeak
headline.print_headline: At a New York Rental to the Stars, the Wood Floors Tend to Squeak
